sourcesContent: import './App.css'; import React from "react" class App extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state={ firstName:"", LastName:"", isFriendly:false, gender:"", favcolor:"" } this.handlechange=this.handlechange.bind(this) } handlechange(event){ const{name,value,type,checked}=event.target type==="checkbox"?this.setState({[name]:checked}):this.setState({[name]:value}) } render(){ return(
